post:
Evolution Host are offering a premium VPS free of charge to users with a popular website in exchange for a small text-based backlink. There is no hard stock limit for this offer. The requirements will be listed at the bottom of the post.

**VPS Specifications**
• 4 vCPU Cores
• 4GB RAM
• 80GB SSD or 350GB HDD Storage
• Gbps port
• Advanced DDoS Protection
• KVM Virtualization
• Multiple Linux OS

These specifications can be improved for websites which would require more resources. 

**Offer Requirements/Details**
• A relatively popular website.
• A link to the Evolution Host website in a section of your site.

**How to apply**
E-mail marketing@evolution-host.com a link to your website. Proof of ownership will be required if your application is accepted.

Not all applications will be accepted, only ones which meet the criteria we are looking for.
